channel.title: keyboard on Eli Rodríguez Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in keyboard on Eli Rodríguez Pérez

item.title: My current keyboard layout
item.description: As you may have realized based on my previous post, I’m really into improving my efficiency when it comes to programming and using the keyboard in general. That’s why I got into Vim and that’s why now I’m into keyboard stuff. When I was little I remember my dad teaching me to touch type, we didn’t even have a computer at home, but my dad thought it was important for me to learn to use a keyboard and brought an old typewriter home.
